item.title: Surf Browser & Wayland
item.description:
Surf

I've been using the Surf browser as a drop in replacement for web apps on Firefox and I've been absolutely loving it. Surf provides you with the bare minimum (frameless!) experience and it's exactly what I want. Now, I know Floorp does have support for them, but having to have an instance of Floorp open in order to use them is a deal breaker for me.
